snippet: President Barack Obama banned new investments in Crimea on Friday, slapping sanctions on the peninsula that Russia annexed from Ukraine earlier this year....

headline.print_headline: Obama Imposes Sanctions on Crimea, Echoes EU
headline.main: Obama Imposes Sanctions on Crimea, Echoes EU

lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama banned new investments in Crimea on Friday, slapping sanctions on the peninsula that Russia annexed from Ukraine earlier this year.
